article.class: post post-9767 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-home-page-feature-post category-36
article.data-name: Boosters programs need your support!

h3.a: Boosters programs need your support!

div.p: An awesome way to show your support of Laker extracurricular programs is to be a part of a Booster program! There is a Booster program for athletics and other non-sports programs, and there is a Band/Fine Arts Boosters program.

p.br: The Booster program is in need of people to help sell concessions at home games. These concessions help fund a wide variety of supplies for student athletes and non-athletes. This program gives more than $20,000 a year – that’s amazing! They can’t do it, though, without help. Concessions can’t be provided at games without human power! To find out more on what you can do to help the Booster program, email lakerboosters@gmail.com.

The Band/Fine Arts Boosters supports the band, choir and theater students. This group has helped outfit the high school band with new concert uniforms and the junior high band with uniform shirts. They provide scholarships to students who attend music camps and help finance the instructors for Marching Band Camp. This boosters group will meet three times this school year – Oct. 7 at 6:30 p.m., March 2 at 6:30 p.m. and May 19 at 6:30 p.m. The meetings are in the band room. If you enjoy fine arts, come on out and help support this group! For more information, contact Samantha Corrion at scorrion@lakerschools.org.

article.class: post post-9442 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-home-page-feature-post category-36
article.data-name: Lakers now enrolling

h3.a: Lakers now enrolling

div.p: If you want to offer your child a high quality education and world class opportunities within a warm and caring atmosphere, look no further than Laker Schools. Lakers is undergoing many awesome facility changes to offer even more exciting opportunities, and our top-notch staff will help your child become the best he/she can be. To enroll, call 989-453-4600 and select option 1 for the secondary school or option 2 for the elementary. Come join our Laker family! Note – enrollment for DK for 2019-20 has now closed.

article.class: post post-8650 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-athleticnews category-home-page-feature-post category-laker-high-school-announcement category-31 category-36 category-13
article.data-name: Blake Smithers places 2nd at state power lifting meet

a.title: Blake Smithers places 2nd at state power lifting meet

h3.a: Blake Smithers places 2nd at state power lifting meet

div.p: At the state power lifting competition March 9-10 in Ionia, Blake Smithers placed 2nd in the state in the super heavy weight division! He achieved 510 squat, 315 bench and 585 dead lift, which are all personal records for him. Congratulations, Blake! (Thank you to Amy Smithers for the photo!) The ladies on the Laker Power Lifting team who qualified for state – Kierstyn Wurst, Jaelyn Talaski and Erin McArdle – all achieved personal records in at least one lift and placed 13th overall in their respective divisions. Great job to the Laker Power Lifting team – what a grand way to close out your first season!

div.h3:
Mission statement:
Laker Schools are dedicated and committed to challenge and encourage all students to reach their highest potential. Through a comprehensive curriculum and a caring educational environment, Laker students will be prepared to excel in a global society.
Please call us at (989) 453-4600 to schedule a visit or click the link below to fill out a form and we will contact you.
